about_the_game:
Soul at Stake - "First Memory" The Phantom's Dress

"First Memory" The Phantom's Dress DLC includes Lovesickness, Fading Face, Brocade Clothes, and Sharp Fingernails.


Lovesickness

Past love and hate were intertwined as black hair became white. That person has passed away, but the hate still grows.

Fading Face

When a person prepares to depart, not a soul has regard for the life being that fading face. Regretful, indeed.

Brocade Clothes

The once splendid brocade, now only a few fragments remain. Its broken beauty can't be concealed anymore.

Sharp Fingernails

It was worn by court and noble women to protect their nails before, but no one knows why it has a sharp edge, just like a razor.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains a chase and slash game mode that uses sharp or blunt weapons, the screen will have a blood splash effect on a successful attack and during the execution event. The setting option "Bloody Mode" is available in the game. Turning off the "Bloody Mode" can remove the blood effects and has a mosaic occlusion when executed.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64-bit Operating Systems (Windows 7, Windows 8.1)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8120
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 Compatible GeForce GTX 460 1GB or AMD HD 6850 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 22 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 Compatible
  • Additional Notes: With these requirements, it is recommended that the game is played on Low quality settings.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: 64-bit Operating Systems (Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8300 or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 Compatible GeForce 960 or AMD R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 22 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 Compatible
